name: HTMLSupporter
description: Enables HTML and CSS element creation with event handling support. Create interactive buttons, inputs, and other UI elements directly in Fluxo code.
author: Fluxo Team

packages.name: fluxo-runtime.js
packages.description: Core Fluxo runtime for executing Fluxo modules in the browser

packages.name: DOM API Support
packages.description: Provides document.getElementById, addEventListener, and other DOM manipulation APIs

packages.name: CSS Inlining
packages.description: Automatically inlines external CSS files for proper preview rendering
